Name: Green Melon Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. (If using egg white then stain back into shaker, DRY SHAKE without ice and fine strain into ice filled glass.)
Review: Neon green in colour and a tad on the sweet side, but each to their own.
History: A 1980s cocktail which emerged after Midori liqueur 's US launch in 1978.
Nutrition: One serving of Green Melon Sour contains 144 calories
